name: They Washed Me Ashore
description:
Nick and Marius are living in a nice little hut at the beach. One day, they get visited by a mysterious figure. Is it friend, or foe?

This game is made by Nick Maierhöfer and Marius Winter. They both just begun to learn Unity and Playmaker and Blender, and this is their first little project. Made in 12 hours.
